name: The Magpie family
description:
Entry for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021. 

Play (alone or with a friend) as the magpie parents who need to find their children. Controls wasd and arrow keys. Stand on top of each other and press down to join and make double jumps. 

Programming: Erno Lokkila
Graphics: Tuisku Polvinen

Due to scheduling issues, the game was made in about 9 hours.
